name: django-anymail
summary: Django email backends and webhooks for Amazon SES, Brevo,  MailerSend, Mailgun, Mailjet, Mandrill, Postal, Postmark, Resend,  SendGrid, SparkPost and Unisender Go  (EmailBackend, transactional email tracking and inbound email signals)
author: Anymail Contributors
